item.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
item.description:
Welcome to my terminal-styled portfolio! This site showcases my projects, write-ups, and thoughts on software engineering and security.

About This Site

This portfolio is built with Hugo using the hugo-theme-shell theme, which provides a unique terminal-style interface. You can interact with the site using terminal commands!

Available Commands

  • help - Show available commands
  • ls - List available sections
  • cd <section> - Navigate to a section
  • clear - Clear the terminal

What You’ll Find Here

  • Projects: My software projects and experiments
  • Write-ups: Technical documentation and CTF write-ups
  • Blog: Thoughts on security, reverse engineering, and software development

Get in Touch

Feel free to check out my GitHub or connect with me on LinkedIn.

item.title: Getting Started with Terminal Navigation
item.description:
Getting Started

Welcome to my terminal-style portfolio! This post will help you navigate and interact with the site.

How to Navigate

This site features an interactive terminal interface. Here’s how to use it:

Basic Commands

  • help - Display all available commands and their usage
  • ls - List all available sections you can navigate to
  • cd <section> - Navigate to a specific section (e.g., cd blog, cd projects)
  • clear - Clear the terminal screen

Navigation Tips

  1. Type commands just like you would in a real terminal
  2. Use the up/down arrow keys to navigate through command history
  3. Try ls first to see what sections are available
  4. Use cd to explore different areas of the site

Explore the Site

Check out these sections:
